title: Add clickzones to page elements
description: Processes a list of paired URL's and selectors. It adds the URL's as links to the elements found using the selectors.

widget.label: Selector and element list (pipe-separated |)
widget.description: List selectors and URL's (pipe-separated, please add the selector first, followed by the URL. e.g. #element1|/home|#element2|/search).
